field: Cool description to a lecture demo website
name: Henrietta Losatter
work_with_me_opening: I am always looking for great students (both undergraduates and M.Sc.). If you are a good student (from the CS. or Math. department in BIU), and you are curious about research and want to learn, we should talk. Expect hard work, but also lots of fun!
